verses.name: Ezekiel 24:4
verses.text: Gather the pieces thereof into it, even every good piece, the thigh, and the shoulder; fill it with the choice bones.

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:5
verses.text: Take the choice of the flock, and burn also the bones under it, and make it boil well, and let them seethe the bones of it therein.

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:6
verses.text: Wherefore thus saith the Lord God; Woe to the bloody city, to the pot whose scum is therein, and whose scum is not gone out of it! bring it out piece by piece; let no lot fall upon it.
